sys_ux_client_script.name: Secondary items link navigation

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_6494b4bb1b6cd5106a08a9b4bd4bcb32
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">a38470bb1b6cd5106a08a9b4bd4bcb6d</macroponent><name>Secondary items link navigation</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const payload = {
        elementId: event.elementId,
        fields: {
            table: event.payload.item.data.table,
            sysId: event.payload.item.data.sysId
        }
    };
    api.emit('RECORD#NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', payload);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>David.Admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-14 07:52:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>6494b4bb1b6cd5106a08a9b4bd4bcb32</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Secondary items link navigation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Working From Home (WFH)" source="x_852034_wfh">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Working From Home (WFH)">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_6494b4bb1b6cd5106a08a9b4bd4bcb32</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>David.Admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-14 08:18:13</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
